Description: Saudi Real Estate Co (known as: SRECO) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. SRECO operates within the Real Estate sector focusing on Diversified Real Estate Activities. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. SRECO is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in July 1976.
